Hello.message: Hello, this bot is designed for downloading videos and audio from YouTube. Choose from the menu what you want to download.

Text.download: Choose from the menu what you want to download.
Text.convert: Choose from the menu what you want to convert.
Text.video: Choose from the menu what you want to do with the video.
Text.message: Choose from the menu what you want to do.

Long.restrictions:
Send the video link.
The video should not exceed 7 minutes.
Long.duration: The video should not exceed 7 minutes.

Audio.restrictions:
Send the video link.
The video should not exceed 50 MB.

VideoNote.restrictions:
Send the video link.
The video should not exceed 1 minute.
VideoNote.duration: The video should not exceed 1 minute.

Buy.message: After payment, we will send you the file.

NewsLetter.message: Choose from the menu what you want to do.

Parsing.message: Choose from the menu what needs to be parsed.

Convert.message: Choose from the menu what you want to convert.

Loading.loading: Please wait for the previous video to finish installing.
